content: nearly three years ago we decided to do a series of simple bean shaped patterns for begining crocheters only to discover that simple and bean shaped isn t a lot of fun to design the results one charming been the beginnings of a truly awful lady bug and nothing else around that time crochet bees were swarming the internet ha so despite liking this little buddy we decided to sit on the pattern until the bee trend buzzed off then in the time honored freddy goat fashion we completely forgot about it happily goat bumbled across it the other day i am on fire and we decided to give it to y all for free if you make yourself a been tag us on ista @freddy_goat_crochet we would love to see your yarny pollinators
